summary: Something to even the color between the shield and armor.
descriptionHtml:
Attention: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THIS BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP AND NO ONE REQUESTING PERMISSION TO DO SO WILL RECEIVE IT. THIS STATEMENT OVERRIDES ANYTHING IN THE PERMISSIONS POPUP THAT IS AVAILABLE ON NEXUS THAT CONFLICTS WITH THIS STATEMENT.

I always found it irritating that the Orcish armor ans the shield were so different in coloring, even though the balance of metal was so close. This is the result of my desire to see the color match between the two.

Installation:
Unrar the file into your Skyrim Data folder.
-OR-
DL with NMM and just let it do it\'s thing.

If you like this, check out my other Skyrim mods:

Dragon Reskins: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9888
Dragon Auras: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9815
My Rain Retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
Snow Retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
author: Sepherose
